text: 1.18 Ese 20.18, 1 Ko 6.20, 7.23, 1 Pi 4.3 Apɨs based nɨbi okok kɨli gos yɨpɨd ma gɨl sawl yɨbɨl gel, gɨ dad amɨl nɨbi abe gelɨgɨpɨm. God pen nɨbop gɨñɨl anɨgɨl dek, apɨs based gelɨgɨpal ak kelɨgɨpɨm. Pen nɨb nepɨm, tap gol, silpa, tap kuyɨg yowep anɨb okok tek ñɨl, nɨbop gɨñɨl anɨgɨl ma dak. Mel.
